name: 黃柏鈞
objective:
瞭解微算機及介面設計之基本觀念與應用，內容包含：1.微算機概論，2.中央處理單元架構、程式規劃及記體模式，3.微算機指令集及定址模式，4.組合語言程式設計，5.硬體介面概論，6.記憶體介面(ROM及RAM)介面，7.輸出入介面、中斷處理及直接記憶體存取，8.微算機系統概述及發展系統簡介。

* Please note that there would be a considerable portion of materials given in English.
schedule:
(Tentative)
1. Typical microcomputer architecture 
2. The single-chip microprocessor
3. The memory: SRAM, DRAM, flash memory, phase-change memory (PCM), spin-transfer-torque RAM (STT-RAM), and resistive RAM (ReRAM).
4. Input / output systems
5. Microcomputer programming concepts 
6. Standards and de facto standards for description of microcomputers: flowcharts, UML, etc.
7. Designs of instruction set and CPU
8. Parallel and concurrent computing techniques
9. General-purpose graphical processing unit (GPU)
10. In-memory computing and process-in-memory (PIM) technologies
11. Next-generation computing paradigms: quantum computers
12. Hardware description languages: VHDL and Verilog
13. Case studies
scorePolicy:
